## Navigation.showLuminanceToggleButton property

Boolean attribute which controls whether to show the luminance (moon) icon on the navigation bar Control via`show-luminance-toggle-button`

**Signature:**

```typescript
showLuminanceToggleButton: boolean;
```

## Remarks

If the user clicks the icon when shown then this class will emit the 'luminance-icon-clicked' event
